comments: Let H be the n X n Hilbert matrix H(i,j) = 1/(i+j-1) for 1 <= i,j <= n. Let B be the inverse matrix of H. The sum of the elements in row n-1 of B equals -a(n-1). - _T. D. Noe_, May 01 2011
